Package climatemonitoring.core

Interface DatabaseMT

public interface DatabaseMT
The database multithreaded interface has the same responsibilities as the non-threaded interface (Database). Every operation returns a Result type
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
ccapiferri
See Also:
  • Result

  • Method Details

    • begin

      Result<Boolean> begin()
      To start a transaction
      Returns:
      Success or failure of the operation

    • end

      Result<Boolean> end()
      To end a transaction
      Returns:
      Success or failure of the operation

    • searchAreasByName

      Result<Area[]> searchAreasByName(String str)
      Returns in alphabetical order an array of areas which have a name that contains the input string. For example, if the given string is 'var' then the output would be an array like this: { "Varese", "Novarese", "Isola Dovarese", ... }
      Parameters:
      str - The input string the search is based on
      Returns:
      The result of the search as an array of areas

    • searchAreasByCountry

      Result<Area[]> searchAreasByCountry(String str)
      Returns in alphabetical order an array of areas which belong to the country whose name contains the input string
      Parameters:
      str - The input string the search is based on
      Returns:
      The result of the search as an array of areas

    • searchAreasByCoords

      Result<Area[]> searchAreasByCoords(double latitude, double longitude)
      Returns in alphabetical order an array of areas which can be found around the specified coordinates. The around is about 0.5 degrees for both latitude and longitude
      Parameters:
      latitude - Value between -90 and 90
      longitude - Value between -180 and 180
      Returns:
      The result of the search as an array of areas

    • searchCentersByName

      Result<Center[]> searchCentersByName(String str)
      Returns in alphabetical order an array of centers which have a name that contains the input string For example, if the given string is "var" then the output would be an array like this: { "Centro di Varese", "Centro di Novarese", "Centro di Isola Dovarese", ... }
      Parameters:
      str - The input string the search is based on
      Returns:
      The result of the search as an array of centers

    • getArea

      Result<Area> getArea(int geoname_id)
      To get an area by its geoname id
      Parameters:
      geoname_id - The geoname id of the area to be searched
      Returns:
      The area that corresponds to the given geoname id

    • getMonitoredAreas

      Result<Area[]> getMonitoredAreas(String center_id)
      To get all the areas monitored by a specified center
      Parameters:
      center_id - The id of the center the search is based on
      Returns:
      The areas monitored as an array of areas

    • getCenter

      Result<Center> getCenter(String center_id)
      To get a center by its center id
      Parameters:
      center_id - The center id of the center to be searched
      Returns:
      The center that corresponds to the given center id

    • getCenters

      Result<Center[]> getCenters()
      To get all the available centers
      Returns:
      All the centers as an array of centers

    • getCenterByAddress

      Result<Center> getCenterByAddress(int city, String street, int house_number)
      To get a center based on its address
      Parameters:
      city - The city the center is located in
      street - The street the center is located in
      house_number - The house number the center is located in
      Returns:
      The center that corresponds to the given address

    • getLatestCenter

      Result<Center> getLatestCenter(int geoname_id)
      To get the center with the most recent recording about the specified area
      Parameters:
      geoname_id - The area's id
      Returns:
      The latest center that submitted a recording for the given area

    • getAssociatedCenters

      Result<Center[]> getAssociatedCenters(int geoname_id)
      To get all the centers that monitor a specified area
      Parameters:
      geoname_id - The id of the area the search is based on
      Returns:
      The centers associated as an array of centers

    • getOperator

      Result<Operator> getOperator(String user_id)
      To get an operator based on their user id
      Parameters:
      user_id - The operator's ID
      Returns:
      The operator whose ID corresponds with the given one

    • getOperatorBySSID

      Result<Operator> getOperatorBySSID(String ssid)
      To get an operator based on their SSID
      Parameters:
      ssid - The operator's SSID
      Returns:
      The operator whose SSID corresponds with the given one

    • getOperatorByEmail

      Result<Operator> getOperatorByEmail(String email)
      To get an operator based on their email address
      Parameters:
      email - The operator's email address
      Returns:
      The operator whose email address corresponds with the given one

    • getParameters

      Result<Parameter[]> getParameters(int geoname_id, String center_id, String category)
      Returns an array containing parameters about a specified area that were recorded by the desired center about a specific category
      Parameters:
      geoname_id - The area's ID
      center_id - The center's ID
      category - The parameter's category
      Returns:
      The result of the search as an array of parameters

    • getParametersAverage

      Result<Double> getParametersAverage(int geoname_id, String center_id, String category)
      To get the average about the score of a specific area, of a specific center about a specific category
      Parameters:
      geoname_id - The area's ID
      center_id - The center's ID
      category - The parameter's category
      Returns:
      The average of the scores as a double

    • getCategories

      Result<Category[]> getCategories()
      Get all the categories and their explanation
      Returns:
      An array of all categories with relative descriptions

    • getLatestCategory

      Result<Category> getLatestCategory(int geoname_id, String center_id)
      To get the category with the most recent recording about the specified area in the specified center
      Parameters:
      geoname_id - The area's ID
      center_id - The center's ID
      Returns:
      The latest category of the given center for the given area

    • addArea

      Result<Boolean> addArea(Area area)
      Adds an area to the database
      Parameters:
      area - The area that needs to be added to the database
      Returns:
      Success or failure of the operation

    • addCenter

      Result<Boolean> addCenter(Center center)
      Adds a center to the database
      Parameters:
      center - The center that needs to be added to the database
      Returns:
      Success or failure of the operation

    • addOperator

      Result<Boolean> addOperator(Operator operator)
      Adds an operator to the database
      Parameters:
      operator - The operator that needs to be added to the database
      Returns:
      Success or failure of the operation

    • addParameter

      Result<Boolean> addParameter(Parameter parameter)
      Adds a parameter to the database
      Parameters:
      parameter - The parameter that needs to be added to the database
      Returns:
      Success or failure of the operation

    • editOperator

      Result<Boolean> editOperator(String user_id, Operator operator)
      Edits an existing operator
      Parameters:
      user_id - The ID of the operator that will get edited
      operator - The new operator that will overwrite the previous one
      Returns:
      Success or failure of the operation

    • includeAreaToCenter

      Result<Boolean> includeAreaToCenter(int geoname_id, String center_id) throws ConnectionLostException, DatabaseRequestException
      To add an existing area to a specified center
      Parameters:
      geoname_id - The area to be added in the center
      center_id - The center the area needs to be added in
      Returns:
      Success or failure of the operation
      Throws:
      ConnectionLostException
      DatabaseRequestException

    • monitors

      Result<Boolean> monitors(String center_id, int geoname_id)
      To check if a monitoring center is monitoring an area
      Parameters:
      center_id - The ID of the center
      geoname_id - The ID of the area
      Returns:
      True if the area is being monitored by a center, false otherwise

    • employs

      Result<Boolean> employs(String center_id, String user_id)
      To check if a monitoring center is employing an operator
      Parameters:
      center_id - The ID of the center
      user_id - The ID of the operator
      Returns:
      True if an operator is being employed by a center, false otherwise

    • validateCredentials

      Result<Operator> validateCredentials(String user_id, String password)
      Checks whether the userid and password are valid. If so, the corresponding operator will be returned, null otherwise
      Parameters:
      user_id - Operator's user id
      password - Operator's password
      Returns:
      The operator whose credentials correspond to the ones in input
